academic.title: Legal Rights and Intellectual Property Policy
academic.integrityDescription: The term academic integrity refers to the policies and systems implemented within the institute to ensure learners achieve the required level of qualification. The institute establishes systems to monitor attendance, track grades, evaluate trainee performance and comprehension, and ensure their ability to pass exams. Based on this, certificates of attendance are provided after completing the course curriculum and attending all lectures.
academic.academicIntegrityAchievement: Abad Network Institute works to achieve academic integrity in remote e-learning training programs through the following:
academic.guidanceForTrainees: Providing guidance and encouraging new trainees to complete the required lessons.
academic.attendanceAndInteraction: Attending and interacting with the trainer during training hours.
academic.loginOnTime: Logging into the platform at the designated time for the course.
academic.certificateBasedOnAttendance: Each trainee is awarded a certificate based on their attendance in the courses.

attendance.title: Attendance Policy
attendance.virtualAttendance: Virtual attendance is equivalent to regular attendance.
attendance.electronicRegistration: Trainees are registered electronically for virtual classes.
attendance.attendancePercentage: The attendance percentage in training courses is calculated such that it does not fall below 75% of the hours.
attendance.certificateEligibility: Trainees are not eligible to receive an attendance certificate if their absence exceeds 25%.

abadNetInfo.title: Ensuring Content Up-to-Date
abadNetInfo.content1: The entity is responsible for ensuring the up-to-date nature of the electronic content provided in the program and that it does not violate national laws and policies.
abadNetInfo.content2: The website (https://www.abadnet.com.sa) is limited to providing only developmental courses.
abadNetInfo.content3: Courses provided through the website do not include any exams or tests at the end of the training sessions.
abadNetInfo.content4: The website offers developmental courses by allowing users to register, verify their identity, and download the course after completing the registration process.
abadNetInfo.acknowledgmentIntro: Abad Network Training Institute (https://www.abadnet.com.sa) acknowledges the following:
abadNetInfo.acknowledgmentPoint1: The institute commits and confirms that the content provided for the courses and trainees is original and not copied from any other websites.
abadNetInfo.acknowledgmentPoint2: The institute commits and confirms that the content complies with the regulations and decisions enforced in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
abadNetInfo.acknowledgmentPoint3: The institute commits and confirms that the content provided for the courses does not violate copyright laws or infringe on the rights of any party or entity.
abadNetInfo.acknowledgmentPoint4: Additionally, the institute commits and confirms to monitor the up-to-date nature of the digital content provided to ensure compliance with national laws and policies, by assigning site supervisors to periodically review the content (at least annually).

legals.title: Legal Policy and Intellectual Property Rights
legals.contentProtected: All content materials published on the pages of Abad Network Institute are subject to intellectual property rights.
legals.complianceWithStandards: We are committed to reviewing all e-learning courses to ensure they are free from intellectual property violations and that the content aligns with standards and specifications, including those of the website.
legals.commitmentToIPProtection: Abad Network Institute is committed to the principles of protecting intellectual property and digital content publishing rights across its platforms.
legals.clearIPPolicy: Intellectual property policies have been clearly communicated to all our staff, and we ensure adherence to these policies throughout the training process.
legals.respectIntellectualProperty: Respect for intellectual property rights and fair use of intellectual property principles and their limitations.
legals.termsAndConditions: Terms and Conditions for accessing the site:

legals.accountPrivacy: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer or our application. You also agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password.
legals.personalDataCollection: Personal data collection is done for the purpose of registering trainees in training courses, entering their data into the website of the General Organization for Technical and Vocational Training, and issuing certificates through the Manar electronic platform affiliated with the organization.
legals.financialSecurity: All payments and financial information are stored with full privacy and confidentiality.
legals.updatingTerms: The site's privacy and usage terms are updated regularly to ensure the site operates effectively and provides the best service to all users.

verification.title: Mechanism for Verifying Trainee Work and Preventing Cheating and Identity Theft
verification.description: Abad Network Institute ensures the accuracy and integrity of trainee data and information by implementing technical procedures. Trainees are required to ensure their information matches the original records and cannot be modified later without coordination with the institute's trainee management department. Additionally, trainees must provide contact details (mobile number and email), which are verified through an authentication message during registration, re-login, or receipt of electronic documents issued from the platform. In the event of unauthorized access, accounts may be suspended and handled technically and legally to protect user accounts and information. If any login attempt involves identity theft, fraud, cheating, or technical forgery, the institute reserves the right to close or suspend the account, take legal and technical actions according to regulations, and hold accountable those responsible, including the perpetrator and beneficiary.
verification.contactSupport: To contact the support team regarding changes to your registered mobile number or email, please reach out to ({email}).

commitment.title: Commitment to Beneficiary Identity Verification
commitment.description: The institute is committed to verifying the beneficiary's identity using appropriate mechanisms to ensure the accuracy of data and information.

mechanisms.title: Identity Verification Mechanisms
mechanisms.introduction: The process of verifying the beneficiary's identity is carried out through two main steps:

step1.title: Step One:
step1.description: Login to the site is completed by sending a message containing a code to the beneficiary's email or mobile phone for verification.

step2.title: Step Two:
step2.description: The center sends the beneficiary's data to the General Organization for Technical and Vocational Training to match and verify the beneficiary's identity using the national ID, especially if the beneficiary requests a certificate.

summary.title: Summary of the Process
summary.description: These mechanisms aim to ensure data accuracy, protect the rights of beneficiaries, and provide a secure and reliable environment for delivering developmental courses.
